law.catch_line: Advertising prohibited without certificate number and the name under which it is issued.

text.section: A carrier who is the holder of a certificate issued by this department shall not advertise under any name other than that in which its certificate is issued.

A person shall not advertise his or her services for the intrastate transportation of passengers or household goods without including in such advertisement the certificate number issued to him or her by the department.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 26, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 359, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(2). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 7.
